message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you this great product at a price of $20,000. I think it would be a valuable asset to you.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Can you meet me at that price?
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $12,000 is a bit too low, I'm willing to come down to $18,000. I believe this product will bring you a lot of value and I want to make sure we can make a deal.
I'm getting closer to the price I'm comfortable with, but $18,000 is still a bit steep. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $14,000. Can you consider that?
